metadata.name: Life After All
metadata.description:
Introduction

Roger Haus was crowned as a Winner of the Times Square Open Call by Superchief NFT Gallery and FOCUS Art Fair. Selected from a pool of 1020 entries, Haus showcases his AI artwork in the vibrant heart of NYC in May 2023.

About the work

'Life After All' belongs to the AI Manga series, a groundbreaking fusion of manga and various art styles. Through the use of AI, Roger masterfully portrays the profound transformation that occurs when life transcends its biological limitations.
